issue.title: Missing Throws element for basic_string_view(It begin, End end)

discussion.p: The standard does not specify the exceptions of this constructor, but since std::to_address is a noexcept function, this constructor throws if and only when end - begin throws, we should add a Throws element for it.
Set status to Tentatively Ready after eight votes in favour during reflector poll.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4892.

blockquote.pre: template<class It, class End> constexpr basic_string_view(It begin, End end);

blockquote.p:
